alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 3:24PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Chenango county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow moves in this evening and could briefly mix with some sleet around midnight before changing back to all snow in the predawn hours Monday. The snow could be heavy at times tonight into Monday morning, with snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour at times. Temperatures remain steady in the upper 20s to lower 30s, making for a heavy wet snowfall which could cause isolated power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
